channel.title: [pi]Xurses -first release - tell me how i did :d[pi]
channel.description:
this was a skilling server so I had to fix alot of glitches most people look over
all EXP rates are handled in config.java The home Tele (H) on spell book isnt being used you can readd it in jsut delete whats there search for homet in clickingb and put cords there.
[b]what i added: [/b][i]-added Summoning base *pets follow you* - added alot more fishing spots - fixed npc glitch use to disappear when attacking you(some) - auto cast with ancient staff - clue scrolls - auto restarter, custom, uniqe!!! (thanks to kattoor, kid who plays my server) =) - aded more things to cooking - added more fish to fishing - added more fishing items ex: harpoon - added more npcs to fishing - added alot more npcs to the game - added a load of drops to the npcs - added a load more slayer monsters - added godwars necklace - completely redid quest interface, it has one quest on it and achievements - added reward when all achievements are done - added you need to do the RFD quest to use any alters (lunars, curses, ancients) - fixed outrages prices when alching/selling to shop - added empty vial used on water gives vial of water - added achievements - added a book that staff or donors can use to bank its item id 5 - I fixed a crap load of bugs, I mean a crap load - added better ::players command - added a yell when someone logs in - aded hp and prayer regain upon login in - added alot of custom commands, there is no ::pickup it is ::find -added ::heal - woodcutting redone 99% thanks to cres - added yell when someone gets 99 - added players with 50+ in ten or more skills can yell - range weps get range destance now [/i][i]- alot alot more was added to this I can't think of them all - added yell, custom playerright ranks ::copy command - added itemonobject, was already there just actually started using it - added kq 100% - added theif of theivs mini game (in ardy -added server announcements - added animation to mini corp beast - added Donor cape - added Gnome Glidders - added DI - added legit type shops - added a few custom items - fixed duel arena dupe - added safe PVP - added more *updating while i code[/i]
LMS/ http://www.youtube.com/embed/NFQ5yQFshpc
Theif mini game http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kz-2R7aKI3I
[i]to active LMS type 1lms as the command to use the ::lms tele for all than type ::2lms to use the ladder in waiting room than type ::3lms to turn mini game off [/i]
LMS is safe PvP it is sorta like free for All on NR
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/34nfgcp.jpg[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/33n7wo1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/260aget.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/14afy3d.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/kf0ad4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/6tife8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/24yocxu.jpg[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2vj4vvl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/9bakg8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2v93lns.jpgrn[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2ed1bb9.jpgrn[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/jzy34h.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2w5ndki.jpg[/img] [im]http://i54.tinypic.com/34goufr.jpg[/img]
Creds Base - BrokenX Me - I have fixed so many things wrong with PI its not funny(well brokenX) Some people on Mopar for their constant help
Client download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2JRI0P7U
Server http://uppit.com/jjqp3yv36l3r/Xurses.zip
Note: Client is set up to my VPS which a deltascape server is now there. it WILL null change the IP in client.java if you can't see client.java veiw hidden files

I used paint to do the crowns lol they are easily fixed though just use even paint.net or gimp or photo shop :d

item.title: [pi]Xurses -first release - tell me how i did :d[pi]
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Thanks for the feedback even if you didnt download it :d I am capable of alot more it was my first pi try also - just in the end pi laggs and i wanted to start over fresher than what I was at so I downloaded a clean base & client and goign to spend a long while coding it eventually after a year or so ill release when i stop doing this :d have fun to whoever rips stuff of of it

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]Xurses -first release - tell me how i did :d[pi]
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

this was a skilling server so I had to fix alot of glitches most people look over

all EXP rates are handled in config.java
The home Tele (H) on spell book isnt being used you can readd it in jsut delete whats there search for homet in clickingb and put cords there.

what i added:
[i]-added Summoning base pets follow you

  • added alot more fishing spots
  • fixed npc glitch use to disappear when attacking you(some)
  • auto cast with ancient staff
  • clue scrolls
  • auto restarter, custom, uniqe!!! (thanks to kattoor, kid who plays my server) =)
  • aded more things to cooking
  • added more fish to fishing
  • added more fishing items ex: harpoon
  • added more npcs to fishing
  • added alot more npcs to the game
  • added a load of drops to the npcs
  • added a load more slayer monsters
  • added godwars necklace
  • completely redid quest interface, it has one quest on it and achievements
  • added reward when all achievements are done
  • added you need to do the RFD quest to use any alters (lunars, curses, ancients)
  • fixed outrages prices when alching/selling to shop
  • added empty vial used on water gives vial of water
  • added achievements
  • added a book that staff or donors can use to bank its item id 5
  • I fixed a crap load of bugs, I mean a crap load
  • added better ::players command
  • added a yell when someone logs in
  • aded hp and prayer regain upon login in
  • added alot of custom commands, there is no ::pickup it is ::find
    -added ::heal
  • woodcutting redone 99% thanks to cres
  • added yell when someone gets 99
  • added players with 50+ in ten or more skills can yell
  • range weps get range destance now
    [/i][i]- alot alot more was added to this I can’t think of them all
  • added yell, custom playerright ranks ::copy command
  • added itemonobject, was already there just actually started using it
  • added kq 100%
  • added theif of theivs mini game (in ardy
    -added server announcements
  • added animation to mini corp beast
  • added Donor cape
  • added Gnome Glidders
  • added DI
  • added legit type shops
  • added a few custom items
  • fixed duel arena dupe
  • added safe PVP
  • added more *updating while i code[/i]

LMS/

Theif mini game

to active LMS type 1lms as the command to use the ::lms tele for all
than type ::2lms to use the ladder in waiting room
than type ::3lms to turn mini game off

LMS is safe PvP it is sorta like free for All on NR














[im]http://i54.tinypic.com/34goufr.jpg[/img]

Creds
Base - BrokenX
Me - I have fixed so many things wrong with PI its not funny(well brokenX)
Some people on Mopar for their constant help

Client download:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2JRI0P7U

Server
http://uppit.com/jjqp3yv36l3r/Xurses.zip

Note: Client is set up to my VPS which a deltascape server is now there. it WILL null change the IP in client.java if you can’t see client.java veiw hidden files
